markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Unbalancing Finisher](/Feats.aspx?ID=1526) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Finisher" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=322" />
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 89 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You attack with a flashy assault that leaves your target off balance. Make a melee Strike. If you hit and deal damage, the target is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) until the end of your next turn.
name: Unbalancing Finisher
